subAboutText: Welcome to our team dedicated to transforming ideas into digital reality. With deep knowledge in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, we build solid foundations, elevating the user experience. Utilizing modern technologies like TypeScript, ReactJS, Next.js, and Node.js, we develop efficient and scalable solutions, providing exceptional end-to-end consistency and performance. We extend our expertise to mobile, excelling in React Native, Firebase, Sass, and Styled Components. From frontend to backend, each line of code reflects our commitment to innovation and quality. Join us on this journey, where excellence is the norm, and each application is a remarkable experience.

projects.subtTextProjectFront: Technologies used in front-end development: React, Next, TypeScript, JavaScript, and Sass.
projects.subtTextProjectBack: Technologies used in back-end development: Node.js, Axios, Firebase, Prisma, and PostgreSQL.
projects.subtTextProjectMobile: Technologies used in mobile development: React Native, Styled Components, Firebase.

web.title: Web Development
web.descriptionText: Every website is unique. We are specialized developers ready to create customized solutions that meet your specific needs. From interactive platforms to innovative applications, to transform your vision into a unique digital experience.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Agility is the key in the ever-evolving digital world. We adopt agile methodologies to ensure that the development of your backend is fast and effective.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: Create amazing experiences for mobile devices. We offer customized solutions to meet your specific needs.
